scripts.demo:lint: cd services/marketplace-service && npm ci && npm run lint
scripts.test:all: powershell -NoProfile -Command "Get-ChildItem -Path services -Directory | ForEach-Object { Write-Host '--- Testing ' $_.Name; $package = Join-Path $_.FullName 'package.json'; if (Test-Path $package) { Push-Location $_.FullName; npm ci; npm test; Pop-Location } }"
